name: Endless Adventure
description:
Adventure game for mobile devices with procedurally generated levels and monsters.
Constantly increasing difficulty, the higher the level, the stronger the monsters.
6 magic to enhance your character:
-The magic of nature imposes poisoning.
-Fire magic sets the enemy on fire.
-Magic of life deals minor damage to the enemy and heals the player.
-Death magic deals huge damage to the enemy.
-Thunder magic shocks the enemy and makes him incapable of combat.
-Earth magic slightly increases damage.
Every 500 meters, a checkpoint and a mini-boss must be killed within a certain time. If you didn't manage to kill it doesn't matter, you can always look into the store, buy armor or strong magic with the coins you earn and try again.
There is also a dungeon with a strong boss.

And many more are planned for future updates.
